name: Ji-Peng Qiang
content: Jipeng Qiang's Home Page at Yangzhou University, China Jipeng Qiang ( 强继朋 ), PhD Professor, IEEE Senior Member School of Information and Artifical Intelligence Yangzhou Univeristy （ 扬州大学 ）,198 HuaYangXi Street, Yangzhou, Jiangsu 225127, China E-mail: jpqiang@yzu.edu.cn Brief Biography I am currently Professor and PhD supervisor at School of Information and Artifical Intelligence in Yangzhou University, Yangzhou, Jiangsu, China. I obtained my PhD degree in November 2016 from Hefei University of Technology, under the supervision of Prof. Xindong Wu. I was a visiting Ph.D. student in University of Massachusetts Boston from October 2014 to June 2016, under the supervision of Prof. Wei Ding and Ping Chen. Research Interests Natural Language Processing, Large Language Model, Data Mining Publications and Citations: at DBLP and by Google Scholar Selection Journals Jipeng Qiang, Yang Li, Chaowei Zhang, Yun Li, Yi Zhu, Yunhao Yuan, Xindong Wu.
